body.p:
367
November 23rd 3
Mr D H Butler
Camp Nelson Ky
Sir
Yours of the 23d inst. desiring recruiting commision, has been referred by the Governor to this office
No more recruiting commissions will issue, at present, for the 47th Ky Infty
If it becomes necessary to appoint an additional number, your application will receive attention --

Very Respectfully
John Boyle
Adjt Gen Ky.
